metadata.synopsis: Default dialogue with Hairy Henry, one of the Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks. Overseen by Krustine, Mistress of Souls. Shouldn't have too much to say. A male bugbear. (Myrkulite)
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks with "goto 728 16 14"- Let the Mistress of Souls finish blessing the Skull Lashers. Do not come too close or interfere.- Talk to Hairy Henry after Krustine's blessing AD has finished.- If you attacked Ketheric on the Moonrise rooftop before coming to Colony, the Myrkulites will be hostile to you on sight.

0.speaker: Hairy Henry
0.text: Heed the Mistress. She is blessed.
